game.name: Block Snake
game.description:
Does a snake game excite your fun senses to the fullest? Are you fond of playing block games when you are bored? Give Block Snake game a try and get a chance to have fun in a combination of snake and blocks! There is no need to bother about the gameplay as it features only simple and easy-to-understand controls. Try to eat as many snakes as possible to help your grow as longer as possible in each level in this one of the best adventure games for kids!

Give it a right direction using the LML when you play on PC or tap the screen when you explore it on mobile phone! You have to 6 unique and challenging levels to play online with your block snake. The longer size your block carries, the highest score would be seen on the screen in the end of each level.  Try to avoid the walls and other obstacles you see on your way to pave your way towards the victory! This casual html5 snake game features simple swipe control, free to play environment and endless gamepaly. 

Challenge your avoiding skills to make the high scores and surprise you with the best possible fun! We maintain a wide array of free skill games to play online which does not ask you to have fun without downloading games. Browse through our huge collection of adventure puzzle games to spot the most engaging and engaging one! We keep updating our website, so you generally find something new after visiting.
